title: Mesoporous Ta2O5/Nb2O5 nanocomposite with Lewis/Br√∏nsted acid sites to enhance stepwise glucose conversion to 5-hydroxymethylfurfural
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00228H, Paper
Sangeeta Mahala, Senthil Murugan Arumugam, Ravi Kumar Kunchala, Bhawana Devi, Sasikumar Elumalai
Herein, we report a higher formation of 5-hydroxymethylfurfural (HMF), a potential liquid fuel precursor, using glucose over a bifunctional Ta2O5/Nb2O5 composite. The mesoporous nanocomposite comprising 25% wt. Nb2O5 provides both...
